description: This is a website custom built for a private practice dietitian. It uses Next.js for the client and Strapi as a headless CMS for blog posts. I decided to use a headless CMS to save time on the development of the admin UI. Additionally, I built an integration to Gumroad which hosts and handles purchasing of PDF documents using their Open API.

Basic instant messenger built with Socket.io for real-time chat updates and info on user online/offline status. I also added support for setting profile pictures using programmatic interaction with AWS S3.

Simple blog / twitter clone built with react, redux, and express. Was my first major project involving a JWT based auth scheme without any type of pre-written package. This project also heavily involved redux for state managment and redux-persist to help maintain application state after page refreshes
